entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Waterton Park
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.9°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Local amount 10 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming light overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending in the morning then clearing. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023
